name: PMO India
description: Full Description: Official App of the Indian Prime Ministers Office. It shows you all of the latest information, news updates & other content related to the PMO. Download the app and stay updated with the PMO anywhere, anytime!   Available in 13 languages.  Keep up with the latest updates from the PMO through the news feed.  View social media updates from the PMO.  Listen to audio recordings and videos of Mann Ki Baat with the PM.  View images from the PMs various interactions and activities  Get notifications about important news and events. ...and much more!
